content: Stephanie I almost spit out my wine when I found, and read, this outstanding article! I am breaking out of the corporate world and starting a distillery….vodka to start with whiskey and bourbon to follow. Half of my net profits are going towards business scholarships for women and towards grants for women entrepreneurs. There are so many smart, badass, sophisticated women out there and I want to be the extra push they may need to be their own boss! Loved reading your inspiring words!!!! Thank you!!!!!!
